Reviews/Synopsis
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please go to the following website for detailed information:
 <a href="
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Brave_Archer_2" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Brave_Archer_2</a>

Renowned film director Chang Cheh returns with Ti Lung, Alexander Fu Sheng, and a stellar supporting cast to create a far-out martial arts spectacle that rivals its predecessor, a rarity in any film industry.
 Our hero Kuo Tsing wins the hand of fair maiden Huang Yung but almost immediately clan rivalries result in Kuo being wounded and an arch rival being named the new leader of the Beggar Clan!
 The legendary Alexander Fu Sheng (Chinatown Kid) is back as Kuo, and Niu Niu shines in her show-stopping role as his dearly betrothed.
